title: MCP Server Generator
description: Generate a complete MCP server from your OpenAPI/Swagger specification

openApiSource.title: OpenAPI Source
openApiSource.description: URL to OpenAPI/Swagger spec (JSON or YAML) or paste the spec directly

language.title: Output Language
language.description: Programming language for generated MCP server

serverName.title: Server Name
serverName.description: Name for your MCP server (will be used in package name and documentation)

includeAllEndpoints.title: Include All Endpoints
includeAllEndpoints.description: Generate tools for all API endpoints. If false, you can filter by tags.

filterTags.title: Filter by Tags
filterTags.description: Only generate tools for endpoints with these OpenAPI tags (only used if 'Include All Endpoints' is false)

includeAuth.title: Include Authentication
includeAuth.description: Generate authentication handling code for API keys, OAuth, or Bearer tokens

generateTests.title: Generate Tests
generateTests.description: Include unit test templates for generated MCP tools
